DOC.brief_summary: Objective : Burning mouth syndrome ( BMS ) chronic oral condition characterize burning symptom affect perimenopausal postmenopausal woman . It seem neuropathy might underlie cause condition . There still insufficient data regard successful therapy . The aim study compare efficacy acupuncture clonazepam 42 BMS patient ( 38 woman , 4 men ) , age range 66.7Â±12 year . Methods : Patients randomly divide two group . Acupuncture perform group I four week , 3 time per week point ST 8 , GB 2 , TB 21 , SI 19 , SI 18 , LI 4 side body well GV 20 , session last half hour.Group II patient take clonazepam two time day ( 0.5 mg ) morning two week two tablet ( 0.5 mg ) morning even next two week . Prior one month either therapy , participant fulfil questionnaire : visual analogue scale , Beck depression inventory , LANSS pain scale , 36-item short form Health Survey ( SF-36 ) Montreal Cognitive Assessment ( MoCA ) . Statistical analysis perform use Student test Pearson 's correlation test . P value low 0.05 consider significant .
DOC.brief_title: Acupuncture Versus Clonazepam Burning Mouth Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: This study approve Ethical Committee School dentistry Zagreb . Prior study every participant sign informed consent accord Helsinki II . All patient recruit Department Oral medicine , School dentistry Zagreb . Patients randomized simple randomization method- flipping coin ( head - acupuncture , tail - clonazepam ) . Inclusion criterion symptom burn oral cavity clinically healthy appearance oral mucosa . Burning symptoms continuous throughout day last 6 month . Some patient also hyposalivation disturbed taste . Prior either therapy well therapy ( one month therapy finish ) every participant fulfil following questionnaire : visual analogue scale ( VAS ) refer severity burning symptom , Beck depression inventory ( BDI ) , The Leeds assessment neuropathic symptom sign ( LANSS ) Pain Scale , 36-item short form Health Survey ( SF-36 ) total sum score Montreal Cognitive Assessment ( MoCA ) . Arm ( I ) traditional Chinese acupuncture - perform 3 time one week four week point ST 8 ( stomach- tou wei ) , GB 2 , TE 21 , SI 19 ( small intestine- ting gong ) , SI 18 ( small intestine- quan liao ) , LI 4 ( large intestine-Yuan ) side body well GV 20 ( Governing vessel-bai hui ) session last half hour . We use sterile acupuncture needle surgical stainless steel silicone coat spring handle , dimensiones choose needle 0.25 diameter 30 mm lenght , insert depht 0.5-1 cun . The elicited response type `` de qi '' accompany redness feel numbness around needle . Arm ( II ) Clonazepam - patient take clonazepam two time day ( 0.5 mg ) morning two week one tablet ( 0.5 mg ) morning another tablet ( 0.5 mg ) even next two week . Statistical analysis perform use Student test Pearson 's correlation test . P value low 0.05 consider significant .
